Title: Creates a nontoxic dry cleaning incentive grant program
Summary: Creates a nontoxic dry cleaning incentive grant program; requires dry cleaners to completely replace their perchloroethylene-based dry cleaning system with a nontoxic system to be eligible for a grant.
LawCode: Add Art 48 ยง48-0101, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the creation of a nontoxic dry cleaning incentive grant program
